'''Azure Excursion''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Pillar of Fortitude" [[Kamisato Ayato]] ({{Hydro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Haran Geppaku Futsu]], a weapon tailored to Kamisato Ayato's gameplay mechanics.
